file_insights.changes: Added error handling with toast notifications
key_modifications: Imported useToast hook from ToastProvider component
Integrated toast notifications for user feedback
Replaced console.error() calls with showError() toast messages
Added showSuccess() toast message after successful area creation
file_insights.impact: Enhanced user experience with visible error and success feedback

patterns_discovered.description: Systematic approach to adding user-facing notifications using a centralized ToastProvider hook
patterns_discovered.implementation: Import useToast, destructure showError/showSuccess, replace silent error logging with toast calls

patterns_discovered.description: Replacing console.error() with user-visible toast notifications for better UX
Adding explicit success notifications after successful operations

gotchas_discovered.description: Previous implementation only logged errors to console, making failures invisible to end users
gotchas_discovered.impact: Users had no feedback when operations failed

gotchas_discovered.description: Only two error scenarios addressed (loadAreas and handleCreateArea); other potential error points may remain unhandled
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Review all async operations in the component for comprehensive error handling

approach_outcome.completion_status: Task completed successfully in single attempt
approach_outcome.subtask_progress: 2 subtasks completed (from 4 to 6 total), bringing project progress to 46% completion (6 of 13 subtasks)
approach_outcome.implementation_quality: Clean, minimal changes that effectively integrate existing toast notification infrastructure
approach_outcome.session_efficiency: Session 7 achieved completion on first attempt with focused, targeted changes

recommendations.recommendation: Audit other API-calling components for similar missing error notifications
recommendations.rationale: This pattern suggests other pages may have the same silent error handling issue

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting error handling pattern into a custom hook to reduce duplication
recommendations.rationale: Multiple components likely need similar loadAreas/API error handling patterns

recommendations.recommendation: Add specific error messages based on error types rather than generic messages
recommendations.rationale: Current implementation uses generic 'Please try again' messages; more specific feedback would improve UX

recommendations.recommendation: Review the 7 remaining subtasks to identify common patterns for bulk implementation
recommendations.rationale: Sequential fixes suggest systematic architectural improvements that could be consolidated
